text: Kearny (pronounced ) is a town in Hudson County, New Jersey, United States. It was named after Civil War general Philip Kearny. As of the United States 2020 Census, the town population was 41,999. == References == ==Other websites== * Town of Kearny website * National Center for Education Statistics data for the Kearny School District * Kearny School District Category:Towns in New Jersey
title: Kearny, New Jersey
